duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain IAM solutions using IBM IAM technology.
Provide 24/7 on-call support as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) for IAM systems.
Design, develop, and implement scalable computing systems with a focus on security, availability, and performance.
Utilize programming languages such as Java and Python to build and maintain cloud and distributed software services.
Analyze, troubleshoot, and resolve issues related to Unix and Windows systems administration.
Collaborate with teams to drive operational excellence, best practices, and project delivery.
Utilize ticketing systems like ServiceDesk and Remedy for issue tracking and resolution.
Demonstrate leadership in the engineering environment, ensuring operational excellence and driving best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
